citation: Proclamation under the On-Demand Passenger Transport Services Industry (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2020 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the On-Demand Passenger Transport Services Industry (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2020

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the On-Demand Passenger Transport Services Industry (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2020 fix 1 December 2022 as the day on which sections 7-11, 13, 15, 16, 21, 22, 24, 25, 30, 32, 37, 38, 42-44, 49-51, 53, 54, 56, 57, 60, 62 and 64 of that Act commence.

7 November 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 November 2022

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
